title: Reduce breathing circle size to maintain a 5% viewport-width margin from side volume sliders

requirements.text: Update the Player screen layout so the BreathingCircle never overlaps the left/right VerticalVolumeControl sliders and always maintains a proportional gap: ensure there is at least a 5% of viewport width (5vw) margin between the circle edge and each slider container on all supported screen sizes/orientations.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Player page, the breathing circle does not overlap either vertical volume slider card at any time.
The minimum horizontal gap between the breathing circle edge and each slider card is >= 5vw (5% of the viewport width).
The breathing circle remains centered between the two slider controls and remains fully visible within the viewport (no clipping).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify any paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change breathing engine timing, voice guidance logic, haptics, ambient audio behavior, or session logging as part of this request.
Do not redesign the Player page beyond the circle sizing/spacing adjustment.
